Articles.Content:
Guys, I have a lot of free time on my hands, and I always wanted to write a long, kerbal story. I want to know how many people would read it if I were to make it. I also want to know if any of you guys have some suggestions as to what I can write about and if you like it, I am willing to make a sequel.

Cheers.
Yeah, duh! No need for our permission!
whats it going to be about pugspaceprogram. I voted yes I have been waiting for someone to make a long story on here

Go for it! I'll read it.

Needs pictures and explosions. Ok maybe just pictures.... and explosions
sounds great man I am looking forward to it
In that case, writing begins on the 20th (for reasons)
Will begin when my computer is fixed!Ã‚Â¡!

Looking forward to seeing what you come up with (I voted a very definite yes by the way )! As for suggestions, this probably isn't terribly helpful but pick something you would want to read about and write about that. I'm sure the folks here could give you a thousand great ideas but in my (admittedly limited) experience, the hard part comes when you've written about that one great idea - and then need to figure what to write about next to continue the story! If you're planning to make this a long tale it needs to be one that you can get stuck into personally - which probably means planning it out yourself, even in rough. If the story deviates from the plan, just roll with it - it doesn't really matter. The plan is just something to give you a start.

As I said, I'm talking from limited experience so take all this with a large bucket of salt. Best of luck with it in any case!

Best of luck with it in any case!

Thanks for the support! I really appreciate it!
someone close this thread it serves no purpose. If you want to write a story, and you have the time, do it.

someone close this thread it serves no purpose. If you want to write a story, and you have the time, do it.

Actually, it currently is serving a purpose. I wouldn't be willing to write a long kerbal story if no one were to read it.

Also, while I'm here, I have to begin writing later, as my computer is somewhat destroyed

someone close this thread it serves no purpose. If you want to write a story, and you have the time, do it.

Easy there. It's not so very different to other threads that get posted here, with a paragraph or two of introduction to a story and a request for feedback before writing any more. A lot of those sink out of sight anyway through not being updated, so they're not really affecting anyone.

Although, there's probably no need for any more 'countdown' updates until the writing actually starts
Yes, I'm always in favour of new storys

Sorry to disappoint you guys, but writing has been delayed; my computer is broken, and it may not be fixed for while.

Cheers.
Go for it. I mean, my only advice would be to try and keep aliens out of it, just because that's a bit of an over used plot device. But seriously, if writing's your thing, I'd say go wild.
